page.title: 05DUNCAN THE BUS DRIVER
page.content: DUNCAN IS A BUS DRIVER. HE DRIVES A MINI_BUS. HE GETS UP AT 7.30 AND COLLECTS THE SCHOOL CHILDREN AT 8.30 A.M. AT 11.A.M. HE GOES TO THE STATION AT LOCHCARRON AND COLLECTS THE MAIL AND ANY PASSENGERS WHO WISH TO GO ON HIS BUS. THERE ARE MORE PEOPLE IN SUMMER THAN WINTER BECAUSE OF THE TOURIST TRADE. HE USUALLY PICKS UP A LOT OF MAIL AS THE TRAIN BRINGS ALL THE MAIL FOR THE LOCALS. HE HAS TWO BUSES AND HIRES ONE OUT. EVERY MONDAY,WEDNESDAY,AND FRIDAY IN WINTER HE GOES TO TORRIDON ,THEN DURING THE SUMMER HE GOES EVERY DAY. DUNCAN TOOK OVER HIS BUSINESS FROM HIS FATHER.HE ENJOYS SAILING AS A HOBBY.
